channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Carl Icahn’s investment arm’s stock slides 9% on report company to again halve dividend
item.description: Icahn Enterprises LP’s stock fell 9% early Friday, after a report that Carl Icahn’s investing arm is planning to cut its dividend to help raise the fu...

item.title: Goldman Pitches a Personal CFO to the Ultrawealthy
item.description: The Wall Street giant is expanding its services in a quest for more assets and stable fee revenue.

item.title: Sony stock rises as gaming and imaging units boost profits
item.description: Sony shares rose in premarket trade Friday after the company reported booming profit growth in the fiscal second quarter.

item.title: Chinese stocks slump after stimulus announcement
item.description: Futures on Hong Kong-listed stocks slumped on Friday after the country unveiled its stimulus program.

item.title: How Seniors Can Do Smart Roth IRA Conversions
Has Luxury Lost Its Shine?
item.description: Customers are complaining that they are getting less bang for their buck at the luxury store.

item.title: The Fed's Next Moves Are Now Anyone's Guess
item.description: Good economic data, and the coming Trump presidency, have thrown everything into doubt.

item.title: ‘I’m a mother in turmoil’: My daughter refuses to see me. She says I didn’t do anything wrong, but I didn’t do anything right. Do I cut her out of my will?
item.description: “Our family trust is a couple of decades old and needs revision.”

item.title: Stock Futures Slip as Strong Week Nears End
item.description: Stock futures wavered but the S&P 500 and Dow industrials stayed on track to deliver their best weekly performances in a year.

item.title: Treasury volatility gauge plunges after market navigates election and Fed
item.description: Bond yields fell as a calmer tone returned to the Treasury market after traders absorbed the re-election of Donald Trump and a Fed rate cut
